content: कोटिः, --टी {%<ab>f.</ab>%} [कुट् इञ्] {@--1@} The curved end of a bow; भूमिनिहितैककोटि कार्मुकं <ls>R. 11. 81</ls>; <ls>U. 4. 29.</ls> {@--2@} The end or extremity, edge or point in general; सहचरीं दंतस्य कोट्या लिखन् <ls>Māl. 9. 32</ls>; अंगदकोटिलग्नं <ls>R. 6. 14</ls>, <ls n="R.">7. 46</ls>; <ls n="R.">8. 36.</ls> {@--3@} The edge or point of a weapon. {@--4@} The highest point, excess, pitch, climax, excellence; परां कोटिमानंदस्याध्यगच्छन् <ls>K. 369</ls>; so कोपकोटिमापन्ना <ls>Pt. 4</ls> excessively angry. {@--5@} The horns or digits of the moon; <ls>Ku. 2. 26.</ls> {@--6@} Ten millions, a crore; <ls>R. 5. 21</ls>; <ls n="R.">12. 82</ls>; <ls>Ms. 6. 63.</ls> {@--7@} The complement of an arc to 90° (in math.) {@--8@} The side of a right-angled triangle (in math.). {@--9@} A class, department, kingdom; मनुष्य°, प्राणि° &c. {@--10@} One side of a question in dispute, an alternative.
